comments.body:
It seems that this project depends on ``pandas``, ``lxml``, ``requests``, ``numpy``, ``keras``, ``matplotlib``, ``scikit-learn``. Am I right? If so, could you please add them as well?
```suggestion
    - python
    - pandas
    - lxml
    - requests
    - numpy
    - keras
    - matplotlib
    - scikit-learn
```

but when i pip install FinMind,
pands and matplotlib are not finmind's dependencies.

i think i should keep it that way.

its a package to import some stock datasets as json file.
we dont need to crawl the website.
https://github.com/FinMind/FinMind#what-is-it


https://github.com/FinMind/FinMind#translation-%E4%B8%AD%E8%8B%B1%E5%B0%8D%E7%85%A7
of course we could use pandas to preprocess json dataset from finmind.
but we DONT really NEED pandas.
